page.title: 03ATTITUDES
page.content:
MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THIS AREA FEEL VERY BAD ABOUT THE ACTIONS OF THE TORY GOVERNMENT AND THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL SECURITY. MOST YOUNG PEOPLE BLAME THE GOVERNMENT FOR UNEMPLOYMENT. AS A RESULT OF UNEMPLOYMENT MANY PEOPLE IN THE DRUMCHAPEL AREA HAVE LOST HOPE. MANY PEOPLE HAVE TURNED TO CRIME AND DRUG ABUSE.
BEARSDEN AND KNIGHTSWOOD ARE HARDLY AFFECTED BY SUCH PROBLEMS.
ON THE POSITIVE SIDE,THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE MAINTAIN A CHEERFUL APPROACH TO LIFE DESPITE THE DIFFICULTIES.
THIS IS ESPECIALLY TRUE OF THE DRUMCHAPEL AREA.
